14#ifndef DNS_NTA_H
15#define DNS_NTA_H 1
16
17/*****
18 ***** Module Info
19 *****/
20
21/*! \file
22 * \brief
23 * The NTA module provides services for storing and retrieving negative
24 * trust anchors, and determine whether a given domain is subject to
25 * DNSSEC validation.
26 */
27
28#include <inttypes.h>
29#include <stdbool.h>
30
31#include <isc/buffer.h>
32#include <isc/lang.h>
33#include <isc/magic.h>
34#include <isc/refcount.h>
35#include <isc/rwlock.h>
36#include <isc/stdtime.h>
37#include <isc/task.h>
38#include <isc/timer.h>
39
40#include <dns/types.h>
41#include <dns/rdataset.h>
42#include <dns/resolver.h>
43#include <dns/view.h>
44
45ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
46
47struct dns_ntatable {
48 /* Unlocked. */
49 unsigned int magic;
50 dns_view_t *view;
51 isc_rwlock_t rwlock;
52 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr;
53 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr;
54 isc_task_t *task;
55 /* Locked by rwlock. */
56 uint32_t references;
57 dns_rbt_t *table;
58};
59
60#define NTATABLE_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('N', 'T', 'A', 't')
61#define VALID_NTATABLE(nt) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(nt, NTATABLE_MAGIC)
62
63isc_result_t
64dns_ntatable_create(dns_view_t *view,
65 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr, isc_timermgr_t *timermgr,
66 dns_ntatable_t **ntatablep);
67/*%<
68 * Create an NTA table in view 'view'.
69 *
70 * Requires:
71 *
72 *\li 'view' is a valid view.
73 *
74 *\li 'tmgr' is a valid timer manager.
75 *
76 *\li ntatablep != NULL && *ntatablep == NULL
77 *
78 * Ensures:
79 *
80 *\li On success, *ntatablep is a valid, empty NTA table.
81 *
82 * Returns:
83 *
84 *\li ISC_R_SUCCESS
85 *\li Any other result indicates failure.
86 */
87
88void
89dns_ntatable_attach(dns_ntatable_t *source, dns_ntatable_t **targetp);
90/*%<
91 * Attach *targetp to source.
92 *
93 * Requires:
94 *
95 *\li 'source' is a valid ntatable.
96 *
97 *\li 'targetp' points to a NULL dns_ntatable_t *.
98 *
99 * Ensures:
100 *
101 *\li *targetp is attached to source.
102 */
103
104void
105dns_ntatable_detach(dns_ntatable_t **ntatablep);
106/*%<
107 * Detach *ntatablep from its ntatable.
108 *
109 * Requires:
110 *
111 *\li 'ntatablep' points to a valid ntatable.
112 *
113 * Ensures:
114 *
115 *\li *ntatablep is NULL.
116 *
117 *\li If '*ntatablep' is the last reference to the ntatable,
118 * all resources used by the ntatable will be freed
119 */
120
121isc_result_t
122dns_ntatable_add(dns_ntatable_t *ntatable, const dns_name_t *name,
123 bool force, isc_stdtime_t now,
124 uint32_t lifetime);
125/*%<
126 * Add a negative trust anchor to 'ntatable' for name 'name',
127 * which will expire at time 'now' + 'lifetime'. If 'force' is true,
128 * then the NTA will persist for the entire specified lifetime.
129 * If it is false, then the name will be queried periodically and
130 * validation will be attempted to see whether it's still bogus;
131 * if validation is successful, the NTA will be allowed to expire
132 * early and validation below the NTA will resume.
133 *
134 * Notes:
135 *
136 *\li If an NTA already exists in the table, its expiry time
137 * is updated.
138 *
139 * Requires:
140 *
141 *\li 'ntatable' points to a valid ntatable.
142 *
143 *\li 'name' points to a valid name.
144 *
145 * Returns:
146 *
147 *\li ISC_R_SUCCESS
148 *
149 *\li Any other result indicates failure.
150 */
151
152isc_result_t
153dns_ntatable_delete(dns_ntatable_t *ntatable, const dns_name_t *keyname);
154/*%<
155 * Delete node(s) from 'ntatable' matching name 'keyname'
156 *
157 * Requires:
158 *
159 *\li 'ntatable' points to a valid ntatable.
160 *
161 *\li 'name' is not NULL
162 *
163 * Returns:
164 *
165 *\li ISC_R_SUCCESS
166 *
167 *\li Any other result indicates failure.
168 */
169
170bool
171dns_ntatable_covered(dns_ntatable_t *ntatable, isc_stdtime_t now,
172 const dns_name_t *name, const dns_name_t *anchor);
173/*%<
174 * Return true if 'name' is below a non-expired negative trust
175 * anchor which in turn is at or below 'anchor'.
176 *
177 * If 'ntatable' has not been initialized, return false.
178 *
179 * Requires:
180 *
181 *\li 'ntatable' is NULL or is a valid ntatable.
182 *
183 *\li 'name' is a valid absolute name.
184 */
185
186isc_result_t
187dns_ntatable_totext(dns_ntatable_t *ntatable, const char *view,
188 isc_buffer_t **buf);
189/*%<
190 * Dump the NTA table to buffer at 'buf', with view names
191 *
192 * Requires:
193 * \li "ntatable" is a valid table.
194 *
195 * \li "*buf" is a valid buffer.
196 */
197
198isc_result_t
199dns_ntatable_dump(dns_ntatable_t *ntatable, FILE *fp);
200/*%<
201 * Dump the NTA table to the file opened as 'fp'.
202 */
203
204isc_result_t
205dns_ntatable_save(dns_ntatable_t *ntatable, FILE *fp);
206/*%<
207 * Save the NTA table to the file opened as 'fp', for later loading.
208 */
209ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
210
211#endif /* DNS_NTA_H */
212
